io.vertx.ext.auth

Interface AuthOptions

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JDBCAuthOptions, MongoAuthOptions, ShiroAuthOptions
    Deprecated. 
    do not use this interface to create a provider, use the provider specific factory.

    @Deprecated
public interface AuthOptions
    A common base object for authentication options.

    Author:
    Julien Viet
